question: Who is the winner of the swiss football league 2025?
responder_answer: As of now, there is no publicly available information about the winner of the Swiss Football League (Swiss Super League) for the 2025 season. The season typically concludes in May, but official sources, such as the Swiss Football League's website or major sports media outlets, have not yet published the final results or the champion for 2025.
revisor_answer:
The winner of the Swiss Football League (Swiss Super League) for the 2024-2025 season is FC Basel. This marks FC Basel’s first Swiss league title since 2017, with their victory inspired by the return of Xherdan Shaqiri to the club from Major League Soccer. The championship was clinched by Basel in May 2025.

References:
- https://apnews.com/article/basel-shaqiri-swiss-champion-ac179b20022e01638d585fb24c21314e
- https://www.sportshistori.com/2025/05/basel-wins-2025-swiss-league-title.html

question: Which country is the winner of the Eurovision Song Contest 2025?
responder_answer: As of now, the winner of the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 has not been announced or is unknown. The event typically takes place in May each year, and unless it has already occurred and the winner has been publicly declared, there is no confirmed information about the winner for 2025 at this time.
revisor_answer:
Austria is the winner of the Eurovision Song Contest 2025. The Austrian opera singer JJ won the contest with the song “Wasted Love” during the Grand Final held in Basel, Switzerland. This marks Austria's first Eurovision victory since 2014 and their third win overall. As is customary, Austria will host the 70th Eurovision Song Contest next year.

References:
- [USA Today](https://www.usatoday.com/story/entertainment/music/2025/05/18/eurovision-song-contest-2025-winner-jj-austria-wasted-love/83710094007/)
- [NPR](https://www.npr.org/2025/05/17/nx-s1-5402096/austria-eurovision-song-69-jj-wasted-love)
- [Eurovision World](https://eurovisionworld.com/esc/jj-from-austria-wins-the-eurovision-song-contest-2025)
